      • getCaretCharPos

        public g4p_controls.ZCaret getCaretCharPos(float offX,
                                  float offY,
                                  g4p_controls.ZCaret caret)
        Get the Caret for a given pixel position relative to top-left corner of view. It takes care of any offset for the text (caused by scrolling)
        Parameters:
        offX - position relative to left edge of view
        offY - position relative to top edge of view
        caret - the caret position matching pixel position
        Returns:

      • getCaretInfo

        public g4p_controls.CaretInfo getCaretInfo(g4p_controls.ZCaret c,
                                  g4p_controls.CaretInfo ci)
        Get the information needed to draw the caret.
        Parameters:
        c - the Caret we are interested in
        ci - the matching caret information
        Returns:
        the match caret information

      • getCaretInfo

        public g4p_controls.CaretInfo getCaretInfo(int pn,
                                  int pln,
                                  int cn,
                                  g4p_controls.CaretInfo ci)
        Get the caret information. Assumes that we are assuming the leading edge is true.
        Parameters:
        pn - paragraph number
        pln - paragraph line number
        cn - character number in line
        ci - the caret information
        Returns:
        the match caret information
